name: Present!
description:
Can you help Felix pull off a sublime presentation?

Thank you for playing my game! I tried to be a little more experimental with this one. Let me know your thoughts on it!  Could have done with more polish but I'm just really glad it got finished and submitted because I was really short on time towards the end...

Icons used:

Present by Cassandra Cappello from the Noun Project

example by Chris Homan from the Noun Project
